items.name: Portal Gun Replica
items.description: A handheld device that lets you create portals to other dimensions.

items.name: Mr. Meeseeks Box
items.description: A box that summons a helpful but short-lived Mr. Meeseeks to assist with tasks.

items.name: Plumbus
items.description: A versatile and mysterious household item, as seen in the show.

items.name: Interdimensional Cable Box
items.description: A device that allows you to watch television from alternate realities.

items.name: Pickle Rick Keychain
items.description: A miniature version of Pickle Rick, a fan-favorite character.

items.name: Meeseeks Socks
items.description: Socks featuring the face of Mr. Meeseeks.

items.name: Morty's Portal Gun Necklace
items.description: A pendant in the shape of Morty's portal gun.

items.name: Schmeckle Coins
items.description: Coins from the dimension of Rick and Morty.

items.name: Tiny Rick T-Shirt
items.description: A shirt with a design of Tiny Rick from one of the episodes.

items.name: Rick's Lab Coat
items.description: A white lab coat similar to what Rick wears in the show.

items.name: Eyehole Man Mask
items.description: A mask of the Eyehole Man, known for his hilarious TV commercial.

items.name: Squanchy Flask
items.description: A flask with Squanchy, the cat-like character, on it.

items.name: Anatomy Park Tote Bag
items.description: A bag featuring the theme park from the episode 'Anatomy Park.'

items.name: Council of Ricks Pin
items.description: A pin that displays the Council of Ricks logo.

items.name: Birdperson's Feather Earrings
items.description: Earrings inspired by Birdperson's distinctive feathers.

items.name: Unity Pendant
items.description: A pendant featuring Unity, one of Rick's love interests.

items.name: Cromulon Head Hat
items.description: A hat in the shape of the Cromulon head from the 'Get Schwifty' episode.

items.name: Scary Terry Slippers
items.description: Slippers resembling Scary Terry's face.

items.name: Get Schwifty Phone Case
items.description: A phone case with the 'Get Schwifty' design.

items.name: Toxic Flask
items.description: A flask inspired by the 'Toxic Rick and Morty' episode.
